  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明

    The Interface StatefulVerbCall.
    SVCPostRecv.RecvWRMod
    Provides access methods to modify a given work-request belonging to this SVC object.
    SVCPostSend.RdmaMod
    Provides access methods to modify the RDMA information of a work request.
    SVCPostSend.SendWRMod
    Provides access methods to modify a given work-request belonging to this SVC object.
    SVCPostSend.SgeMod
    Provides access methods to modify a given scatter/gather element.

    IbvQPCap
    These attributes define the maximal queue size of a QP.
    IbvQPInitAttr
    Attributes used when initializing a queue pair.

    Unsupported.
